meanings.definition: A type of vitamin found in certain foods.
meanings.sent1: Etamins are important for our health and can be found in fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent2: I make sure to eat foods rich in etamins to stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: The etamins in that smoothie gave it a refreshing taste.
meanings.sent4: Her energy levels soared after she started taking etamins regularly.
meanings.sent5: The doctor emphasized the importance of etamins for overall well-being.

meanings.definition: A nutrient essential for good health.
meanings.sent1: Etamins are crucial for maintaining a strong immune system.
meanings.sent2: Including etamins in your diet can help prevent illnesses.
meanings.sent3: She joked that etamins were like tiny superheroes fighting off sickness.
meanings.sent4: The benefits of etamins on the body are truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: His glowing skin was a testament to the power of etamins in his diet.
